title: Controlled Blink
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

*For a blink that you can control, see [scroll of blinking](/Scroll_of_blinking "Scroll of blinking").*

| [![Controlled blink.png](/images/1/16/Controlled_blink.png)](/File:Controlled_blink.png) Controlled Blink |                                                            |
| :-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- |
| Level                                                                                                     | 8                                                          |
| School1                                                                                                   | [Translocation](/Translocations "Translocations")          |
| Source(s)                                                                                                 | - [Book of the Warp](/Book_of_the_Warp "Book of the Warp") |
| [Casting noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                                                               | 3 (at the destination)                                     |
| [Spell noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                                                                 | 0                                                          |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                           |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | Translocates the caster a short distance, with precise control. Be wary that controlled translocations will cause the subject to become contaminated with magical energy. |

**Controlled Blink** is a level 8 [Translocations](/Translocations "Translocations") spell which warps you to a nearby open space of your choice in your [line of sight](/Line_of_sight "Line of sight"). The space must be somewhere visible, not deep water or lava, and cannot be behind a translucent wall.

While exploring the [Realm of Zot](/Realm_of_Zot "Realm of Zot") or while carrying the [Orb of Zot](/Orb_of_Zot "Orb of Zot"), Controlled Blink functions like a plain, uncontrolled [Blink](/Blink "Blink").

## Strategy

Usually too expensive to train for a 3 rune game, but it's an excellent escape spell for [extended](/Extended "Extended"). Keep in mind that [Passage of Golubria](/Passage_of_Golubria "Passage of Golubria") exists, and with a bit of pre-planning, can be used to a similar effect. The benefit of Controlled Blink is that it works in emergencies.

### Tips & Tricks

- For stabbers, it can be very useful to know the noise grid of this spell. The "@" character is the position where you land after blinking, and the "§" characters are cells where the noise will be heard.

```
.........
....§....
..§§§§§..
..§§§§§..
.§§§@§§§.
..§§§§§..
..§§§§§..
....§....
.........
```

## History

- Controlled Blink was removed in [0.26](/0.26 "0.26"). Controlled Blink's effect can still be found on the [scroll of blinking](/Scroll_of_blinking "Scroll of blinking").
- Prior to [0.17](/0.17 "0.17"), Controlled Blink was a level 7 spell. Additionally, use of this spell on levels that prevented [teleport control](/Teleport_control "Teleport control"), such as [The Tomb](/The_Tomb "The Tomb") and final levels of a [Ziggurat](/Ziggurat "Ziggurat"), resulted in an uncontrolled Blink.
- In [0.6](/0.6 "0.6"), you couldn't blink into deep water even as a [merfolk](/Merfolk "Merfolk") unless you were levitating.
- Prior to [0.6](/0.6 "0.6"), Controlled Blink was noisier than [Blink](/Blink "Blink") and could wake everything within radius 7.
html:
Controlled Blink

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.

For a blink that you can control, see scroll of blinking.

 Controlled Blink
Level 8
School1 Translocation
Source(s)
  • Book of the Warp
Casting noise 3 (at the destination)
Spell noise 0
Translocates the caster a short distance, with precise control. Be wary that controlled translocations will cause the subject to become contaminated with magical energy.

Controlled Blink is a level 8 Translocations spell which warps you to a nearby open space of your choice in your line of sight. The space must be somewhere visible, not deep water or lava, and cannot be behind a translucent wall.

While exploring the Realm of Zot or while carrying the Orb of Zot, Controlled Blink functions like a plain, uncontrolled Blink.

Strategy

Usually too expensive to train for a 3 rune game, but it's an excellent escape spell for extended. Keep in mind that Passage of Golubria exists, and with a bit of pre-planning, can be used to a similar effect. The benefit of Controlled Blink is that it works in emergencies.

Tips & Tricks

  • For stabbers, it can be very useful to know the noise grid of this spell. The "@" character is the position where you land after blinking, and the "§" characters are cells where the noise will be heard.

.........
....§....
..§§§§§..
..§§§§§..
.§§§@§§§.
..§§§§§..
..§§§§§..
....§....
.........

History

  • Controlled Blink was removed in 0.26. Controlled Blink's effect can still be found on the scroll of blinking.
  • Prior to 0.17, Controlled Blink was a level 7 spell. Additionally, use of this spell on levels that prevented teleport control, such as The Tomb and final levels of a Ziggurat, resulted in an uncontrolled Blink.
  • In 0.6, you couldn't blink into deep water even as a merfolk unless you were levitating.
  • Prior to 0.6, Controlled Blink was noisier than Blink and could wake everything within radius 7.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Controlled_Blink&oldid=71637"
